text: walaw shina labaeathna fi kuli qaryat ndhyrana, yadeuhum 'iilaa allah eaza wjl, wyndhrhm edhabh, wlkna jaealnak - 'ayuha alrasul - mbewthana 'iilaa jmye 'ahl alard, wamrnak 'ana tblghhm hdha alqran, fala tutie alkafirin fi tarak shay' mimaa arslt bh, bal 'abdhul jhdk fi tblygh alrsalt, wajahad alkafirin bhdha alquran jhadana kbyrana, la ykhalth ftwr
